column1: Table 6-26:  Net CO2 Flux from Forest C Pools in Land Converted to Forest Land by Land Use Change Category (MMT CO2 Eq.)
Other Land Converted to Forest Land
+ Absolute value does not exceed 0.05 MMT CO2 Eq.

Notes: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding. Parentheses indicate net uptake. These estimates only include land conversions in the CONUS–land conversions in Alaska and Hawaii were not included in this Inventory.
